name: outro
commands: Guys, look.|That pillar is sorta strange.
It's got a strange tome sitting on it.|Do you think this is the cause of the events here?
Great work!|Let me take a look.
Hmm...interesting|Very interesting.|By the looks of it, it seems that this tome here was the catalyst.
This tome feeds off the intent of others.|It can cause the malice in people to rise thereby creating chaos.
Yes...|Perhaps by the time they realized, it was already too late.|That's why this pillar is here.|However, you can wield it.
Yes, you.|You hold light magic so you're resistant to its calls of darkness.|This tome will be quite the boon for you.|Want it? If not, I'll safeguard it.
Hey...I don't fully understand this magic but...|this sounds like a terrible thing to have.
I agree with Senya.|It's caused this whole place to ruins.|Even if you're resistant, you're not immune.
But what if the power can help us defeat that mage?
I don't think it's worth the risk.|It's not that we don't want to defeat the mage...|it's just that we're worried.
We don't know anything else about this tome.|It might be powerful, but it's more trouble than its worth.
You're resistant to its effects.|But it's to you.
I think it's worth the risk.
MC...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
Don't make us worry, got it?
That tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.
Alright, that take cares of that.
Thank goodness.|I would have hated it if that tome had to travel with us.
That's a relief.|Thanks for heeding our advice.
Now, after you all are rested and ready to go|I'll help warp you off to your destination.|Take it as your thanks.
source:
speak;Senya;Guys, look.|That pillar is sorta strange.
speak;Schuri;It's got a strange tome sitting on it.|Do you think this is the cause of the events here?
speak;Aesc;Great work!|Let me take a look.
add_unit;Aesc;12,18
move_unit;Aesc; 13,14
speak;Aesc;Hmm...interesting|Very interesting.|By the looks of it, it seems that this tome here was the catalyst.
speak;MC;What do you mean?
speak;Aesc;This tome feeds off the intent of others.|It can cause the malice in people to rise thereby creating chaos.
speak;Schuri;That's terrible!
speak;Aesc;Yes...|Perhaps by the time they realized, it was already too late.|That's why this pillar is here.|However, you can wield it.
speak;MC;Me?
speak;Aesc;Yes, you.|You hold light magic so you're resistant to its calls of darkness.|This tome will be quite the boon for you.|Want it? If not, I'll safeguard it.
speak;Senya;Hey...I don't fully understand this magic but...|this sounds like a terrible thing to have.
speak;Schuri;I agree with Senya.|It's caused this whole place to ruins.|Even if you're resistant, you're not immune.
speak;MC;But what if the power can help us defeat that mage?
speak;Senya;I don't think it's worth the risk.|It's not that we don't want to defeat the mage...|it's just that we're worried.
end_skip
speak;Schuri;We don't know anything else about this tome.|It might be powerful, but it's more trouble than its worth.
speak;Aesc;You're resistant to its effects.|But it's to you.
#choice
choice;_ch3TomeChoice;Should I take the Tome?;Yes,No
##
end_skip
if;game.game_vars['_ch3TomeChoice'] == 'Yes'
    inc_game_var;_SenyaOpinion-1
    inc_game_var;_SchuriOpinion-1
    speak;MC;I think it's worth the risk.
    #idk which item
    give_item;MC;Nosferatu
    speak;Schuri;MC...|Alright I can't say I'm happy about your decision, but...|I'll trust you.
    speak;Senya;Don't make us worry, got it?
elif;game.game+vars['_ch3TomeChoice'] == 'No'
inc_game_var;_SenyaOpinion+1
    inc_game_var;_SchuriOpinion+1
speak;MC;That tome will be in a better place with you, Sir.
speak;Aesc;Alright, that take cares of that.
speak;Senya;Thank goodness.|I would have hated it if that tome had to travel with us.
speak;Schuri;That's a relief.|Thanks for heeding our advice.
end
speak;Aesc;Now, after you all are rested and ready to go|I'll help warp you off to your destination.|Take it as your thanks.
